jd: Job Description -Job Title: DBAClient: Location: hybrid in Morristown, NJ (only locals)Duration: 12 months C2HMOI: F2F Job Description:Need a solid DBA Someone that has extensive experience with PL/SQL and performance tuning of Oracle SQL code.Roles and Responsibilities:1.
